Try.description: By default IDEA completes your code instantly. Start typing Ran right where the caret is, and you will see Lookup Menu of completions. You can choose the first item from Lookup menu by pressing
To activate Basic Completion action press <action="CodeCompletion"> and you will see lookup menu again.
Press <action="EditorEnter"> to choose top item from lookup menu.
Sometimes you need to find completions for static constants or methods. Press <action="CodeCompletion"> twice to increase search level of Code Completion.
